name: Myastoriya
description: Myastoriya - the Steak and Grill Network. Territory selected Ukrainian steaks! You can order steaks, meat and ready-made meat dishes!

name: Frozenfood UA
description: Frozenfood UA is a reliable manufacturer and supplier of hamburgers, cheeseburgers for retail stores and HORECA channel.

name: Auchan
description: In the Auchan hypermarket you will find a wide selection of food products, including fresh vegetables and fruits, dairy products, meat and fish, sweets and snacks, as well as alcoholic beverages.

name: MrGrill
description: Mr.Grill is a well-known Ukrainian brand of hot dogs made from real meat. This is a delicious and convenient snack in the crazy rhythm of the city. It was Mr.Grill that introduced the culture of hot dog consumption in Ukraine.

name: McDonald's
description: McDonald's is a world-famous brand that provides a delicious, fast and convenient snack in the frantic rhythm of the city.
